                      boolean tournament)
        It starts the execution of the startup phase. starts reinforcement phase
        Parameters:
        bc - is an object of board model
        cm - is an object of card model
        list - represents list of player objects playing the game
        turn - represents current turn of the player and he will roll the dice
        score - score
        tournament - tournament

      • fortification

        public boolean fortification(Player player1,
                             Player player2,
                             int amount)
        It starts the execution of fortification phase. Most common fortification strategy in all board game is passing of assets between players according to the rules of the game.
        Parameters:
        player1 - is a player who is giving an asset
        player2 - is a player who is receiving an asset
        amount - is the money to be transferred between players
        Returns:
        boolean
